channel.title: How to change ip
channel.description: ok so i downloaded a source and client how do i change the ip of the client so i can go on my own server. by the way i download the evolution client and source.

item.title: How to change ip
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

Chances are it’s not a 562, so go ahead and open up either Loader.java, Client.java or GUI.java and search for 127.0.0.1 and change the ip.

if it’s not set at 127 then you’re going to have to manually look through the file and search for the IP input.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change ip
item.dc:creator: @liam6502 liam6502
item.description:
@liam6502 wrote:

Search it, pretty common question… also what base. if its 562 then >>http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/snippets/247028-562-client-how-change-ip-your-own-d.html 317 then Search 127.0.0.1 and replace that with your ip… it should follow something like “setserver”

Read full topic
